wikipedia_page.main: James Clegg (born 5 January 1994) is a British Paralympic swimmer. Clegg competes in S12 events and qualified for the 2012 Summer Paralympics, winning the bronze in the men's 100 m butterfly event. He is the brother of fellow para-swimmer Stephen Clegg and para-athlete Libby Clegg.

response: Clegg has two brothers who have also competed at the Paralympics: James, who competed in the pool in the S12 category at London 2012,James Clegg. British Paralympic Association and Stephen, who also swam in the same class at Rio 2016 and Tokyo 2020.

Stephen Clegg (born 23 November 1995) is a British Paralympic swimmer. He won bronze in the Men's 100 metre backstroke S12 and Men’s 100 metre freestyle in 2020, in which he broke the British record with a time of 53.43. He is the brother of fellow para-swimmer James Clegg and para-athlete Libby Clegg.
